content: गमनं [गम्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Going, motion, gait; श्रोणीभारादलसगमना <ls>Me. 82</ls>; so गजेंद्रगमने <ls>Ś. Til. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Going, motion. considered as one of the five {%karmans%} by the Vaiśeṣikas. {@--3@} Approaching, going to. {@--4@} March of an assailant. {@--5@} Undergoing, suffering {@--6@} Obtaining, attaining. {@--7@} Cohabitation.
